mapper.select: SELECT ps_id, wh_name, p.pro_num, pro_name, ps_cnt, p.pro_unit FROM product_stock ps JOIN product p ON p.pro_id = ps.pro_id JOIN warehouse w ON w.wh_id = ps.wh_id ORDER BY ps_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_stock (ps_num, pro_id) SELECT CONCAT(SUBSTRING(ps_num, 1, 2), LPAD(max(ps_id) + 1, 6, '0')), #{maxProId} FROM product_stock WHERE ps_num LIKE CONCAT('%', 'PS', '%')
